      • checkIfEntryExist

        private boolean checkIfEntryExist(long id,
                        java.lang.String sn_id,
                        java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user or the post
        sn_id - shortcut of the social network as defined in enum SocialNetworks
        type - must be set to either post or user
        Returns:
        true on success (found) or false in case of ANY error
